data.name: Setback
data.detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

Are you interested in helping us test Setback's alpha, flaws and all? If so you can sign up for alpha testing right here on this steam page by requesting access to the Setback Playtest.

Join our Discord and follow us on Twitter to stay up to date on alpha playtest schedules!


About the Game

Setback is an online, free-to-play arena shooter. The game is built around a core mechanic called “setbacking”, where a player is rewinded back through time. Players compete in various movement-oriented game modes, using different weapons and consumable pick-up items.

Rewind your opponents back through time

Every player in Setback is protected by invisible armor. When the armor breaks, the player is rewinded back to wherever they were a couple of seconds ago. To weaken the armor of other players, you can choose among different weapons, including automatic rifle and grenade launcher, all infused with time-altering technology. Or, if done right, you can turn the tide of a match by using one of the consumable pick-up items, such as the slow-down field.


Movement is key!

The various game modes in Setback are designed with fast-paced mobility in mind, keeping the players on their feet at all times. To progress through the stage, you can be creative with several different movement mechanics, like sliding and surface bashing. The race mode, for instance, is a race by foot through a sequence of checkpoints. Other game modes include new takes on already well-known concepts, such as King of the Hill and Capture the Flag.






Setback is currently under development, feel free to join our Discord and follow us on Twitter to catch the latest updates!

data.short_description: Setback is a fast-paced arena shooter and a new take on the traditional FPS. The core mechanic, “setbacking”, replaces death with a rewind through time and space.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
